file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-01-01-06 - COMPRESSOR - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COMPRESSOR - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the borescope inspection of the compressor section. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 72-01-01-200-801-A COMPRESSOR SECTION - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-01-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-01-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COMPRESSOR SECTION - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do the borescope inspection of the compressor section, see the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 412 LH Engine upper cowling 422 RH Engine upper cowling 413 LH Engine lower cowling 423 RH Engine lower cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-01-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. (2) Put the workstand in the work area. (3) Remove the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the engine. J. Inspect Compressor Section SUBTASK 290-002-A (1) Do a borescope inspection of the compressor section. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • START 1/2. (4) Refer to the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 to do the related check after an engine LRU maintenance procedure, as applicable.
